mapper.select: select (select count(*) from export_c ) as epnum, (select count(*) from ext_eproduct_c exte WHERE export_product_id in( select export_product_id from export_product_c where e.EXPORT_ID=e.EXPORT_ID )) as extnum, e.CREATE_TIME,e.CREATE_DEPT,e.CREATE_BY,e.STATE,e.CNUMBER,e.PACKING_UNIT,e.AMOUNT,e.BOX_NUM, e.CONSIGNEE,e.CONTRACT_IDS,e.TRANSPORT_MODE,e.TAX,e.SIZE_WIDTH,e.SIZE_LENGTH,e.SIZE_HEIGHT,e.EXPORT_ID, e.PRICE_CONDITION,e.CNUMBER,e.INPUT_DATE,e.LCNO,e.GROSS_WEIGHT,e.COST_PRICE,e.COST_TAX,e.CSIZE,e.CUSTOMER_CONTRACT, e.DESTINATION_PORT,e.MARKS,e.SHIPMENT_PORT,e.PACKING_LIST_ID,e.NET_WEIGHT,e.NO_TAX,e.EXPORT_ID,e.REMARK,e.MEASUREMENT from export_c e

select (select count(*) from export_c ) as epnum, (select count(*) from ext_eproduct_c exte WHERE export_product_id in( select export_product_id from export_product_c where e.EXPORT_ID=e.EXPORT_ID )) as extnum, e.CREATE_TIME,e.CREATE_DEPT,e.CREATE_BY,e.STATE,e.CNUMBER,e.PACKING_UNIT,e.AMOUNT,e.BOX_NUM, e.CONSIGNEE,e.CONTRACT_IDS,e.TRANSPORT_MODE,e.TAX,e.SIZE_WIDTH,e.SIZE_LENGTH,e.SIZE_HEIGHT,e.EXPORT_ID, e.PRICE_CONDITION,e.CNUMBER,e.INPUT_DATE,e.LCNO,e.GROSS_WEIGHT,e.COST_PRICE,e.COST_TAX,e.CSIZE,e.CUSTOMER_CONTRACT, e.DESTINATION_PORT,e.MARKS,e.SHIPMENT_PORT,e.PACKING_LIST_ID,e.NET_WEIGHT,e.NO_TAX,e.EXPORT_ID,e.MEASUREMENT from export_c e WHERE e.EXPORT_ID=#{id}
